Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.ldaptive.asn1.AttributeValueAssertion
    Use NameValue
    org.ldaptive.asn1.DN
    Use Dn
    org.ldaptive.asn1.RDN
    Use RDn
    org.ldaptive.DnParser
    Use an implementation of DnParser
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.ldaptive.ext.MergeOperation.add​(Connection, MergeRequest, LdapEntry)
    use MergeOperation.add(MergeRequest, LdapEntry)
    org.ldaptive.ext.MergeOperation.delete​(Connection, MergeRequest, LdapEntry)
    use MergeOperation.delete(MergeRequest, LdapEntry)
    org.ldaptive.ext.MergeOperation.modify​(Connection, MergeRequest, LdapEntry, LdapEntry)
    use MergeOperation.modify(MergeRequest, LdapEntry, LdapEntry)
    org.ldaptive.extended.IntermediateResponse.getResponseValueParseHandler()
    this method was originally intended for use by subclasses to reduce the complexity of parsing. Unfortunately performing parsing as part of class construction can have side effects. Most notably, subclasses that do variable initialization will overwrite the results of the parsing.
    org.ldaptive.extended.SyncInfoMessage.setEntryUuids​(Set<UUID>)
    use SyncInfoMessage.addEntryUuids(UUID...)
    org.ldaptive.LdapAttribute.escapeValue​(String)
    use DefaultAttributeValueEscaper
    org.ldaptive.pool.AbstractConnectionPool.grow​(int)
    Use AbstractConnectionPool.grow(int, boolean)
    org.ldaptive.pool.AbstractConnectionPool.validateAndPassivateConnection​(PooledConnectionProxy)
    use AbstractConnectionPool.passivateAndValidateConnection(PooledConnectionProxy) instead
